text: E kamaghɨn fo, Krais uabɨ ia bagha areme. A Godɨn damazimɨn derazir gumazim, egha a Godɨn damazimɨn derazir puvatɨzir gumazamizibar danganim inigha areme. A bar gumazamizibar arazir kuraba batueghɨva me inigh God bagh mangasa, dughiar vamɨra aremegha gɨfa. A uam aremeghan kogham. Egha a nguazir kamɨn gumazir inivafɨzimɨn mɨn itima me a mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam a gamizɨ a ua dɨkavigha angamɨra iti.
